assignments.description: Assign the Amount paid/received from the Import Order record because a successor item override won't have the pricing applied from the Import Order record

value.stringValue: Product Does not exist in Pricebook

assignments.description: Set to null if no delivery account was found for the {!sov_Order.Billto__c} reference to not fail when doing a check in a decision later in the flow
assignments.name: Billto_Acc_Null

assignments.description: Set Order Activate Order = true if any blocks needed for gen2 in future
assignments.name: Set_Override_Auto_Activate

assignments.description: Set to null if no delivery account was found for the {!sov_Order.Shipto__c} reference to not fail when doing a check in a decision later in the flow

decisions.description: This previously blocked orders for activation where Activation Block Source is NOT null (for gen2 orders). We're removing this block now.
decisions.name: Block_Auto_Activate

rules.name: Header_and_lines_need_to_be_retriggered

rightValue.stringValue: No Order Found for the provided reference

rules.name: checkrequired
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR (6 AND 7)
rules.label: checkrequired

decisions.description: This check is done to always set the Original Pricebook Entry List price so it's not overwritten when a successor item is selected and the PB Entry required for the successor. This is done to calculate the discount correctly from the Original price and not the successor price.
decisions.name: Set_Product_List_Price
decisions.label: Set Product List Price

decisions.name: Should_Shipping_Costs_Exempt_be_set
decisions.label: Should Shipping Costs Exempt be set?

Flow.description: CH: 2022/08/17 Changed OrderEmailNotification formula. DB: 2022/08/22 Added Custom Pricing Method Assign Logic. CH: 2022/08/24 Added Courier Information Assignment. DB: 2022/08/31 Removed the Private Individual Pause logic. CH: 2022/09/16 Fixed logic for setting ship by date CH: 2022/09/20 Added logic to remove .txt from external order ID CH: 2022/09/22 Added assignment for additional courier information CH: 2022/09/27 Now passing ImportOrder to SuccessorUpdate apex action SP: 2022/10/11 Add Error check for inactive pricebook entries DB : 2022/10/14 Added CourierWholeSaleId Shipping Cost Exempt assignment check and map maxQuantity from Product onto OrderProduct DB: 2022/10/17 Removed the OrderItem Reference formula saved onto the OrderItem CH: 2022/10/18 Added Pallet Registration Number assignment DB: 2022/10/24 OrderItemReference assignment update DB: 2022/11/10 Save User details (Name, Email, School Number, CustomerOrderType) to Order to see Ordered By CH: 2022/11/30 Added in new ship to attention of and bill to attention of logic (if blank on import order, fetch from accounts) DB: 2022/12/20 Added PaymentCreationDate mapping to Order from Order Header & set block if ActivationBlockSource__c has a value CH: 2023/02/06 Removed ActivationBlockSource__c = true (still there, just set it to false) CH: 2023/02/20 Added delivery phone and delivery email mapping SP: 2023/02/20 Added ImportItemGroupEAN mapping CH: 2023/03/28 Changed OrderNotificationEmail logic and added in logic for OrderNotificationEmail2 CH: 2023/04/04 Added delivery email and phone logic CH: 2023/04/14 Set Invoicing Frequency to Daily for Private Individuals CH: 2023/04/18 Added DUD Order assignment CH: 2023/04/21 Added DUD Order manual discount assignment DB: 2023/05/31 Updates the Import Location searches on how the Account is found and assigned CH: 2023/06/01 Changed a decision for Trade (changed an equals to Contains) DB: 2023/06/02 Added Logic for Tender/Transfer Sales Order DB: 2023/07/05 Included successor item check for inactive pricebook entry products CH: 2023/07/07 Removed DUD Checkbox assignment DB: 2023/07/10 Successor Item price assignment fix DB: 2023/07/23 Payment Mothed assignment fix DB: 2023/08/11 Get Order searching for Orders with Status 'Draft' only CH: 2023/08/22 Added unable to lock row retry on last line check DB: 2023/09/04 Apply custom price assignment for source eCommerce Order Products with Discounted Price DB: 2023/09/13 Studiemeister added to decision conditions where eCommerce B2C is referenced CH: 2023/09/15 removed custom list pricing for eCommerce DB: 2023/09/28 map Order Source and Type onto Order Product record HdG: 2023/10/04 add sources to decItemGroupComponentCheck DB: 2023/10/04 revise invoice and deliveryIdLocation for not finding account(s) based on search value DB: 2023/10/04 skip successor update & inactive pricebook entry check for Depot Orders CH: 2023/10/05 shipping costs exempt for Tender Transfer orders HdG: 2023/10/06 change assignment of payment status (pending => payment_pending) CH: 2023/10/16 added subtype__c mapping CH: 2023/10/31 PBE get excludes delivery status = null

formulas.description: If Email__c on import order is filled, use this value - else, get the email value (Billing Reminder) from the account
formulas.name: OrderBillingEmail

formulas.description: If Email__c on import order is filled, use this value - else, get the email value (Ship To Email) from the account
formulas.name: OrderEmailNotification

formulas.description: If Email__c on import order is filled, use this value - else, get the email value (Order Invoice) from the account
formulas.name: OrderInvoiceEmail

formulas.description: This formula calculates the total VAT of an Import Order Product record
formulas.name: OrderItemTotalVAT

Flow.label: Import Order Handler

recordLookups.description: This get takes the Communication Language on the Import Order and get the metadata record mapped to the expected value to retrieve the valid picklist value that is used on the Account
recordLookups.name: GetCommunicationLanguageSetting
recordLookups.label: Get Communication Language Setting
